name: SPX Technologies, Inc.
description: SPX Technologies, Inc. is a global supplier of highly engineered, mission-critical components and systems that serve the needs of essential industries such as energy, food and beverage, and industrial processes. With a history dating back to 1912, SPX has evolved into a diversified, publicly traded company focused on delivering innovative solutions that enhance productivity, efficiency, and safety across various sectors. The company operates through two primary segments: HVAC and Detection & Measurement. In the HVAC segment, SPX provides a range of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning products, including chillers, fans, and heat exchangers, aiming to improve energy efficiency and reduce environmental impact. The Detection & Measurement segment specializes in high-performance products for pressure, temperature, and flow measurement, catering to the rigorous demands of industrial applications. SPX is committed to sustainability, continuously investing in research and development to create products that not only meet customer needs but also support environmental stewardship. With a robust portfolio and a customer-centric approach, SPX Technologies is well-positioned to capitalize on industry trends and drive long-term growth.
